item.title: A better alternative to Adblock Plus
item.description: Or is an adblocker the best solution after all? - I have been using AdBlock Plus for years now. After reinstalling my desktop recently, I decided to try something else. We can alter the hosts file on our PC to blacklist domains. Table of contents How do ad blockers work? The hosts file Blocking ads, trackers & malware Automatically updating...

item.title: Tic-Tac-Toe with Phoenix & Vue [Part 1]
item.description: Creating the game engine - Introduction In this tutorial series, we are going to write a web-app that enables 2 players to play the Tic-Tac-Toe game online. It will be leveraging the OTP platform to make the app scalable and fault tolerant and consist of the following elements: Tic-Tac-Toe engine - A separate elixir app...
